layer.description: The layer for which this row is relevant.

ne_max.description: The maximum number of evolutions of the next lower layer by a pGC in this layer.

ne_mean.description: The mean number of evolutions of the next lower layer by a pGC in this layer.

ne_min.description: The minimum number of evolutions of the next lower layer by a pGC in this layer.

performance.description: The performance of this layer. See docs for definition of performance.

size.description: The number of individuals in the layer.

worker_id.description: The ID of the worker writing this row.

created.description: The time at which the layer statistics were calculated. This is the end of the target layer epoch.
